TopicTitle: [1.2 Steam] Crash when reverting to vehicle assembly

Articles.Content:
Hi, I am not sure where to post my crash reports so I just try it here

I had this crash several times now, always after playing for more than two hours (not sure if that's a coincidence).

The crash does only happen when I revert to Vehilce of Space Plane Assembly. The game just crashes to the desktop when I clicked the button.

Here is the generated crash log:

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/psrx0ybv10s0s4m/AACkbBb7GH4t3urY3iW4fn1Fa?dl=0

Hope you can work with this.

Have a nice day and thanks for the awesome game

7 hours ago, Smire said:

Hi, I am not sure where to post my crash reports so I just try it here

I had this crash several times now, always after playing for more than two hours (not sure if that's a coincidence).

The crash does only happen when I revert to Vehilce of Space Plane Assembly. The game just crashes to the desktop when I clicked the button.

Have a nice day and thanks for the awesome game 

I can't view the error log since i'm on mobile, but how often do you get the crashes? if it's only occasionally, then that's completely normal. If you get one every time then you should try doing some things (i.e see if it happens on a different save or after reinstalling KSP) to try to narrow down what's causing it

3 hours ago, Clockwork13 said:

I can't view the error log since i'm on mobile, but how often do you get the crashes? if it's only occasionally, then that's completely normal. If you get one every time then you should try doing some things (i.e see if it happens on a different save or after reinstalling KSP) to try to narrow down what's causing it

This was the fourth time in five days, it happens about every four or five hours, so I can live with it. Just wanted to be sure to report it

Hi @Smire, you have a lot of these errors. 

NullReferenceException
  at (wrapper managed-to-native) UnityEngine.Behaviour:get_enabled ()
  at VPWheelCollider.UpdateVisualWheel () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at VehiclePhysics.VehicleBase.LateUpdate () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

It suggests there is something wrong with the install, can you please try verifying the cache for KSP in Steam, thank you.

4 minutes ago, sal_vager said:

Hi @Smire, you have a lot of these errors. 


NullReferenceException
  at (wrapper managed-to-native) UnityEngine.Behaviour:get_enabled ()
  at VPWheelCollider.UpdateVisualWheel () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at VehiclePhysics.VehicleBase.LateUpdate () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

It suggests there is something wrong with the install, can you please try verifying the cache for KSP in Steam, thank you.

I will do so and post here if it happens again

I checked the files with steam, it found and redownloaded one file.

I could play for some time and then the game crashed again, this time when I wanted to recover my landed vessel (so again when I left the flying mode).

Here is the error log:

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/38ahbhw0m6ilqiz/AACc6YNHAnyA6R9AlO4ZuA_ca?dl=0

The crash.dmp file can't be uploaded. It has 0 Byte in size and when I open it with editor it is empty :/

After this crash I checked the files again and steam found another corrupt file and redownloaded it... What the hell is wrong?
